Our Bark In The Park team is back!

The goal: wear stupid t-shirts and raise $16,000 with over 100 team members for @Providence_AC. Save the homeless pets!

Join the team and raise at least $50 and get the shirt.

Join the team or donate at this link: https://t.co/TPzQOR03Ig https://t.co/YdEmolPti6

Remember, the money we raise not only helps save animals, but helps support the lives and careers of Providence Animal Center employees who have dedicated their lives to saving these pets. Good stuff all around!
Our goal this year is to break our own record, and raise $16,000 with over 100 members to support @Providence_AC! You can also just donate at the link.
